pr_title: RM24763 Fixed NPE when company has no linked partner on saleOrder form

timeline.message: RM24763 Fixed NPE when company has no linked partner on saleOrder form

timeline.bodyText: This is ok but just to be safe please rename companyId => companyPartnerId, keep it a long and set it to 0 instead of null
timeline.author: ale-axelor

timeline.message: Renamed var and set it to 0 instead of null
